CustomField.description: The "security threat score" of this keyword. Higher score indicates a higher priority. A value of zero indicates a totally innocent word, while a value of 1000 would signify a word that, alone, would high security threat. Values of 50,100,150 etc would indicate an important word, but one that, alone, may not pass the score over the threshold.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a value indicate the security threat level of this keyword. Zero indicates no security threat; 100 signals important; use 1000 for words such as bomb that, when they appear, should always be treated as high threat.
CustomField.label: Security Threat Score
